Package controller

Class PhotoSearchController

java.lang.Object
controller.PhotoSearchController
public class PhotoSearchController
extends java.lang.Object
The Photo Search Controller implements the search functionality and displays the output result to the user.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    PhotoSearchController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean checkdatefields()
    Checks if the dates are available in the datepicker box and prompts the alert of only one of them is selected and returns false.
    void handleAddTag​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    Handles add tag functions to add tags to the list view for the search criteria.
    void handleBackToAlbumsButton​(javafx.event.Event event)
    Handles the back button and takes the current user to display user dash-board.
    void handleCreateAlbumFromResults()
    Handles Create Album button, after the search and creates a new album titled "Search + current-date-time" for the user and adds all the photos from the photo list view to the album.
    void handleLogoutButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    At any given point the user can logout and it will take user to the main login screen.
    void handleRemoveTag​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    Handles remove tag button and removes the selected tag pair from the list.
    void handleSearchPhotos​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    Handles Search photo button and on click, it goes through every photo in every album for the user and checks the date range as well as the tag pair and add to the photo view.
    void start​(User user, java.util.ArrayList<User> users)
    On Start the user and users are initialized.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • PhotoSearchController

      public PhotoSearchController()

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start​(User user, java.util.ArrayList<User> users)
      On Start the user and users are initialized. The tag-type and tag-value choice boxes are initialized by loading all the unique tags and values from all the photos for a user.
      Parameters:
      user - takes the current user.
      users - takes the list of users.

    • handleLogoutButton

      public void handleLogoutButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      At any given point the user can logout and it will take user to the main login screen.
      Parameters:
      event - takes the mouse event.

    • handleBackToAlbumsButton

      public void handleBackToAlbumsButton​(javafx.event.Event event)
      Handles the back button and takes the current user to display user dash-board. with all the albums.
      Parameters:
      event - takes the mouse click event.

    • handleAddTag

      public void handleAddTag​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles add tag functions to add tags to the list view for the search criteria. The selected tag type and tag value is checked in the list view and added if it doesn't exist.
      Parameters:
      event - takes the mouse click event.

    • handleRemoveTag

      public void handleRemoveTag​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles remove tag button and removes the selected tag pair from the list.
      Parameters:
      event - takes the mouse click event.

    • handleSearchPhotos

      public void handleSearchPhotos​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles Search photo button and on click, it goes through every photo in every album for the user and checks the date range as well as the tag pair and add to the photo view.
      Parameters:
      event - takes the mouse click event.

    • checkdatefields

      public boolean checkdatefields()
      Checks if the dates are available in the datepicker box and prompts the alert of only one of them is selected and returns false. Returns true if both the dates are filled.
      Returns:
      boolean value true or false.

    • handleCreateAlbumFromResults

      public void handleCreateAlbumFromResults()
      Handles Create Album button, after the search and creates a new album titled "Search + current-date-time" for the user and adds all the photos from the photo list view to the album. Then saves the data using common function.
